item.title: Cyberton theme
item.description: Before I launched my website, I decided to make my life harder by creating an open-source Hugo theme. And the earth would stop rolling, if I hadn’t written this post about it. TL;DR This site uses Hugo. It is a static site generator written in Hugo. No dependency hell called node_modules. Many themes of various qualities can be found here. I was curious, how horrible it will be making my own.
